data.title: Ajinomoto Group Global Website - Eat Well, Live Well.
data.meta_description: See our global network of subsidiaries and affiliates that spans five continents to deliver products and services to consumers and businesses around the world.
data.meta_site_name: Ajinomoto Group Global Website - Eat Well, Live Well.
data.text:
IntroductionAJINOMOTO Foods Nigeria Limited AFN is a food seasoning manufacturing and marketing company established in Nigeria in 1991 with her factory located at 37, Creek Road, Apapa- Lagos.

An affiliate of the AJINOMOTO Company Inc., Tokyo, Japan in Nigeria; AFN is totally committed to providing our numerous customers with the best quality, safety, high valued, differentiated products that meet their needs, wants and in conformity with regulatory requirements.IntroductionPresent in Brazil since 1956, Ajinomoto do Brasil is a japanese multinational and a world reference in amino acids. The company offers quality products for both consumers and ingredients for food, cosmetics, sports, pharmaceutical, animal nutrition and agribusiness industries. In Brazil, the company also operates in the food service segment. With four manufacturing units, located in the state of São Paulo, in the cities of Limeira, Laranjal Paulista, Valparaíso and Pederneiras, and Headoffice in the capital, it employs around 3,000 people and serves both the domestic and foreign markets. IntroductionEstablished in 2009, Ajinomoto de México focuses on the Food Service business to offer flavor, quality, and healthier products with gluten-free and low sugar products. Our seasoning line with selected and premium products will help you to prepare easier, quicker, and rich in flavor dishes. Our jelly line with 5 flavors, will bring you an experience of a unique and tasteful dessert with low sugar. Enjoy also the original and famous AJI-NO-MOTO® and Hondashi® to bring deliciousness to your dishes and on top of that, you can enjoy a sodium reduction.Introduction【English】Established in 1968, Ajinomoto del Peru S.A. is leader in the production and marketing of seasonings and food products. Since its creation, it has been committed to good nutrition and the well-being of society. In this sense, it currently promotes healthy eating campaigns such as the delicious salt reduction with AJI-NO-MOTO®, contributing to the prevention of cardiovascular diseases. As a sign of its commitment to produce with the highest quality standards, it has ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45000 certifications. It is also part of the Association of Good Employers (ABE) for its good labor practices.

【Español】Establecida en 1968, Ajinomoto del Perú S.A. es líder en la elaboración y comercialización de sazonadores y productos alimenticios. Desde su creación está comprometida con la buena alimentación y el bienestar de la sociedad. En ese sentido actualmente impulsa campañas de alimentación saludable como la deliciosa reducción de sal con AJI-NO-MOTO® contribuyendo en la prevención de enfermedades cardiovasculares. Como muestra de su compromiso por elaborar con los más altos estándares de calidad cuenta con certificaciones ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45000. Asimismo, es parte de la Asociación de Buenos Empleadores (ABE) por sus buenas prácticas laborales.IntroductionAs a leading manufacturer in the frozen food industry, Ajinomoto Foods North America is dedicated to contributing to a healthier lifestyle through nutritious and balanced foods. With a commitment to excellence and innovation, all our products are cooked with our customers in mind, providing healthy and delicious meals for all.

We currently operate eight factories and one main office in the United States with over 3,000 employees.

Our products span across the largest categories of ethnic frozen foods ranging from Asian to Mexican, and coat appetizers across every distribution channel including foodservice, grocery, warehouse club, and custom manufacturing.IntroductionAs part of the Ajinomoto family, Ajinomoto Health & Nutrition brings the highest-quality products to manufacturers and consumers while contributing to significant advances in nutrition and health through amino acids, creating opportunities for people to enjoy and live healthier lives. Industries include biopharmaceuticals, food and beverage, wellness & sports nutrition, food service, animal nutrition, nutraceuticals, specialty & personal care, regenerative medicine, and medical nutrition.IntroductionAJINOMOTO CAMBODIA (AJC) is incorporated in Cambodia in 2009 as a private limited liability company under the Commercial Law of Commerce in accordance with its investment license number Inv. 1496/09E, which was issued on 1 September 2009. AJC obtained its Qualified Investment Project (“QIP”) status from the Counsel for the Development of Cambodia on 15 September 2009. AJC’s business objectives were registered with related ministry of Cambodia as the following:

•Manufacture of processed spices and condiments: Repack “AJI-NO-MOTO” monosodium glutamate (MSG) and produce “RosDee” flavour seasoning.

•Retail sale of other food products n.e.c: Import instant coffee “Birdy” and Instant noodle “Yum Yum”, Flour seasoning from the related parties, affiliate of Ajinomoto Group. IntroductionFounded in 2002, registered capital of 27.827 million US dollars. The total area spans 51,431 square meters of which production area covers 8,578 square meters, with annual production capacity of 16,000 tons. Shanghai Ajinomoto Seasoning has been able to combine its product development capabilities and technology with the production base and market reach, offering umami and flavor powdered seasonings in China. Best-selling retail products: Tiantianxian, Bonito/Scallop flavored seasonings Best-selling ingredients: M-SUPER P, SUPER I+G, meat-enhancing compound seasoningsIntroduction【English】Founded in 2002, registered capital of 27.827 million US dollars. The total area spans 51,431 square meters of which production area covers 8,578 square meters, with annual production capacity of 16,000 tons. Shanghai Ajinomoto Seasoning has been able to combine its product development capabilities and technology with the production base and market reach, offering umami and flavor powdered seasonings in China.

Best-selling retail products: Tiantianxian, Bonito/Scallop flavored seasonings

Best-selling ingredients: M-SUPER P, SUPER I+G, meat-enhancing compound seasonings

【中文】成立于2002年，注册资本2782.7万美元，总面积51431平米，生产面积8578平米，年产量1.6万吨，主营鲜味及风味型粉状调味料，具备研发团队及专业厨师技术指导，提供多款零售产品如天添鲜、鲣鱼及干贝风味复合调味料等，最畅销的原料产品为M-SUPER P、SUPER I+G、肉味增强复合调味料。IntroductionPT Ajinomoto Indonesia which is a part of Ajinomoto Indonesia Group, has been established in Indonesia since 1969. Alongside the first umami seasoning in the country, AJI-NO-MOTO®, Ajinomoto Indonesia Group’s product Masako® is the No.1 Flavor Seasoning in Indonesia, trusted and chosen by Indonesian mothers thorough the country.IntroductionAjinomoto (Malaysia) Berhad (AMB) started its business operations in 1961 as AJI-NO-MOTO® distributor. It is one of the very first Japanese companies to be set up in Malaysia. AMB has since grown into a dynamic food and seasoning manufacturer, marketing diverse brand names that are trusted by Malaysians for decades, such as Rasa Sifu™, SERI-AJI®, AJI-SHIO®, TUMIX®, aminoVITAL®, PAL SWEET®, etc., as well as industrial products for both local and export markets. AMB aims to be a “Global Customer-Centric Halal Food Company” to contribute in resolving people’s food and health issues through our specialties and innovative solutions.IntroductionEstablished in May 9, 1958, AJINOMOTO PHILIPPINES CORPORATION(APC) supplies quality seasoning and food products in the Philippines directly servicing supermarkets, wholesalers, public markets and the food service industry.

Committed to work towards its goal to become a solution providing company that contribute to food and health issues. With passion for continuous improvement and innovation, APC carries out its mission to bring happiness to every Filipino through products and services that contribute to food and wellness, and to better lives of the Filipino society, as captured in our slogan “Eat Well, Live Well.”IntroductionEstablished in 1973 to promote and distribute Ajinomoto products in the Singapore market through the retail and supermarket channels. We offer a variety of products including seasonings, frozen foods, processed foods, beverages, sweeteners and amino acids for the consumer market as well as the catering and food processing industries. Ajinomoto Singapore also performs vital functions to support the Group’s global operations, such as the procurement of flexible packaging materials, chemicals and raw materials, the provision of logistic solutions, and developing new businesses in the region.IntroductionThe umami seasoning of AJI-NO-MOTO ® was launched in Japan on 20th May 1909. In a mere year after its launch, AJI-NO-MOTO ® was first shipped to Taiwan in 1910.

Our Business in Taiwan includes Household, Food Service, Food Ingredient, Health Care Food department, and import the products of Ajinomoto Group from Japan, Shanghai, Thailand, Vietnam, Malaysia, Indonesia, Brazil. We also produce some products by OEM for meeting costumer’ need.

Under the Ajinomoto Group Quality Policies, we comply with the Ajinomoto System of Quality Assurance(ASQUA) to ensure products quality and safety.Introductionestablished in 1960 as the first affiliate of Ajinomoto Co., Inc., Japan to manufacture AJI-NO-MOTO® products and a diverse range of high-quality products for Thai consumers. The company has grown and diversified to be the Ajinomoto Group of Companies in Thailand with around 7,000 staff, consisting of 15 production bases and affiliates, to manufacture various products such as seasonings, beverages, instant noodles, processed foods, frozen foods, etc.IntroductionWan Thai Foods Industry Co.,Ltd. leading manufacturers of instant noodles in Thailand was established in 1971 marketed under YumYum ® Brand. Over 50 years YumYum has provided the happiness with truly delicious and authentic Thai tastes through a wide-ranging variety of instant noodles products to satisfy our consumers and customers with the best quality in both domestic and overseas markets.
